group_1.textRight: Mii, I’m sorry about today.@I said a lot of strange things…
Maybe I was just imagining things.

group_1.textLeft: Yup, it was in a book about the photo exhibit.
We were able to become incredibly close.@We promised to play again next time.
That's what we're messaging each other about@right now, in fact!

group_1.textRight: Whaddaya know, so she stuck with ya@and now you're friends again?
That, I’m glad ta hear.@I’m relieved, I really am…
You were just about to make a friend,@and then that dream was getting in the way again…
However, while it is great that you are getting along,@please put away the smartphone during mealtime.
It seems that such behavior is rude@to the person who cooked it.
That's right, after dinner is over,@you can call 'em as much as ya like.

group_1.textLeft: Speaking of Mikage,@I heard you talked with her using telepathy.

group_1.textRight: I haven't heard ya talk yet.@I'm super jealous…

group_1.narration: Once asleep, the dream continues@from where it had left off,
with violent gunshots and screams,@red blood mixing together, pooling at my feet.
I’m sure that today, I’ll be scared and shivering too.@I’m about to be crushed by my own sin.
But I came along with others@looking to cleanse our hearts.@I have friends who believe in me,@and that my heart will shine.
Simply having someone believe in me@made me a little stronger.
I'm going to become a good person,@good enough to be able to hit those words right back.

group_1.textCenter: Little by little, with my own strength,@I have to begin walking…
